mapper.select: select api_id from api_mst where uri = #{requestUri}
mapper.insert: insert into axs_history( api_id, servicer_id, access_date, request, update_time ) values( #{apiId}, #{servicerId}, #{accessDate, typeHandler=com.spatialid.app.common.convert.StrToTimestampWithMiliTypeHandler}, #{request, typeHandler=com.spatialid.app.common.convert.JsonNodeTypeHandler}::jsonb, #{updateTime, typeHandler=com.spatialid.app.common.convert.StrToTimestampTypeHandler} ) on conflict(api_id, servicer_id, access_date) do update set http_status=#{httpStatus}, error_detail=#{errorDetail}, update_time=#{updateTime, typeHandler=com.spatialid.app.common.convert.StrToTimestampTypeHandler}
